statements: ALTER TABLE user_energy_data ADD COLUMN energy_provider_id INT
ALTER TABLE user_energy_data ADD CONSTRAINT fk_energy_provider FOREIGN KEY (energy_provider_id) REFERENCES energy_providers(provider_id)
ALTER TABLE energy_providers ADD COLUMN rating FLOAT
ALTER TABLE energy_producers ADD COLUMN production_capacity INT DEFAULT 0
ALTER TABLE energy_consumers ADD COLUMN energy_consumption FLOAT DEFAULT 0
ALTER TABLE energy_production ADD COLUMN is_approved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
ALTER TABLE customers ADD COLUMN email STRING
ALTER TABLE supplies DROP COLUMN description
ALTER TABLE products MODIFY COLUMN price DECIMAL
ALTER TABLE EnergyCompany ADD COLUMN address VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE EnergyCompany MODIFY COLUMN industry VARCHAR(150)
ALTER TABLE EnergyCompany DROP COLUMN company_name
